title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: None Course Contents Science of Macro Economics and Circular Flow; National Income Accounting: Concepts and Measurements; Aggregate Demand and Aggregate Supply- Classical Theory of Employment, Keynesian Theory of Effective Demand; Consumption and Investment Functions; Multiplier; Accelerator; Multiplier-Accelerator Interaction; IS-LM Analysis.
